name: Entrance Hall
description: You are standing in the grand entrance hall. There is a door to the north.

name: Library
description: A dusty old library with shelves full of books. There's a door to the south.

name: Kitchen
description: A dingy kitchen with a broken stove. Looking at the utensils and cutlery strewn across the counters and floor, it looks like people were in a rush to leave...
